verses.verse: <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that they might <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> even those did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5927>bring<s%> up.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> to him, were with him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> that could not be <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to his <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, even <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H478><s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> forth their <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof <S%H4605>above.<s%>

And they <S%H748>drew<s%> out the <S%H905>staves,<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> out in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1687>oracle,<s%> and they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>without:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they are to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was <S%H369>nothing<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3240>put<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> were <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>
I have <S%H403>surely<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> you an <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H2073>dwell<s%> in, a <S%H4349>settled<s%> place for you to <S%H3427>abide<s%> in for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> about, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> (and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood;<s%>)

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and has with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4480>Since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be <S%H8033>therein;<s%> but I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to be <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3282>Whereas<s%> <S%H834><s%> it was in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> to my <S%H8034>name,<s%> you did <S%H3190>well<s%> that it was in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

<S%H7535>Nevertheless<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> but your <S%H1121>son<s%> that shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of your <S%H2504>loins,<s%> he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> to my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6965>performed<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and I am <S%H6965>risen<s%> up in the <S%H8478>room<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>promised,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And I have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> when he <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven:<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> you, in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> or <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath,<s%> who <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3824>heart:<s%>

<S%H834>Who<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that you <S%H1696>promised<s%> him: you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and have <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that you <S%H1696>promised<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H7535>so<s%> that your <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way,<s%> that they <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me as you have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let your <S%H1697>word,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, be <S%H539>verified,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%>

But will <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>contain<s%> you; <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> less <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>built?<s%>

Yet have you <S%H6437>respect<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and to his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prays<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H3117>day:<s%>

That your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day,<s%> even <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there:<s%> that you may <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall make <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And <S%H8085>listen<s%> you to the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> and when you <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive.<s%>

If any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>trespass<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5375>laid<s%> on him to cause him to <S%H422>swear,<s%> and the <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> on his <S%H7218>head;<s%> and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

When your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> down <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you, and shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to you, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray,<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to you in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

When <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is <S%H6113>shut<s%> up, and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you; if they <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you <S%H3384>teach<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they should <S%H3212>walk,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> there be in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7458>famine,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there be <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H7711>blasting,<s%> <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> <S%H697>locust,<s%> or <S%H3588>if<s%> there be <S%H2625>caterpillar;<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> their <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities;<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5061>plague,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H4245>sickness<s%> there be;

<S%H3605>What<s%> <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H834>soever<s%> be made by <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> or by <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of his own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> you in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3605>according<s%> to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> you <S%H3045>know;<s%> (for you, even you <S%H905>only,<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men;<s%>)
That they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> a <S%H5237>stranger,<s%> that is not of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but <S%H935>comes<s%> out of a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> for your <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake;<s%>
